x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: Two new columns have been introduced in Kingston for benefit plan - Offset and Duration. This fix script calculates and populates the values to be populated in these columns for benefit plans created prior to Kingston.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Populate offset&duration on benefit plan

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_66a3b38483e89e50c6695855eeaad316
